title: I’m Married To The Devil
itunes:title: I’m Married To The Devil
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I've been married for exactly one year to the devil. My husband is an IT manager and I’m a veterinarian. I celebrated our one-year anniversary and then I went to visit my parents for the weekend. My visit was cut short when I got a call from my neighbor saying there were a lot of cars at my house and she knew I was out of town....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I've been married for exactly one year to the devil. My husband is an IT manager and I’m a veterinarian. I celebrated our one-year anniversary and then I went to visit my parents for the weekend. My visit was cut short when I got a call from my neighbor saying there were a lot of cars at my house and she knew I was out of town....................
